author: Not available

text.0: Cyning sceal rice healdan.      Ceastra beoð feorran gesyne,
text.1: orðanc enta geweorc,      þa þe on þysse eorðan syndon,
text.10: gold gumena gehwam,      and gomol snoterost,
text.11: fyrngearum frod,      se þe ær feala gebideð.
text.14: byldan to beaduwe      and to beahgife.
text.15: Ellen sceal on eorle,      ecg sceal wið hellme
text.16: hilde gebidan.      Hafuc sceal on glofe
text.17: wilde gewunian,      wulf sceal on bearowe,
text.19: toðmægenes trum.      Til sceal on eðle
text.2: wrætlic weallstana geweorc.      Wind byð on lyfte swiftust,
text.20: domes wyrcean.      Daroð sceal on handa,
text.21: gar golde fah.      Gim sceal on hringe
text.22: standan steap and geap.      Stream sceal on yðum
text.24: segelgyrd seomian.      Sweord sceal on bearme,
text.25: drihtlic isern.      Draca sceal on hlæwe,
text.26: frod, frætwum wlanc.      Fisc sceal on wætere
text.27: cynren cennan.      Cyning sceal on healle
text.28: beagas dælan.      Bera sceal on hæðe,
text.29: eald and egesfull.      Ea of dune sceal
text.3: þunar byð þragum hludast.      þrymmas syndan Cristes myccle,
text.31: tirfæstra getrum.      Treow sceal on eorle,
text.32: wisdom on were.      Wudu sceal on foldan
text.33: blædum blowan.      Beorh sceal on eorþan
text.34: grene standan.      God sceal on heofenum,
text.35: dæda demend.      Duru sceal on healle,
text.36: rum recedes muð.      Rand sceal on scylde,
text.37: fæst fingra gebeorh.      Fugel uppe sceal
text.38: lacan on lyfte.      Leax sceal on wæle
text.39: mid sceote scriðan.      Scur sceal on heofenum,
text.4: wyrd byð swiðost.      Winter byð cealdost,
text.40: winde geblanden,      in þas woruld cuman.
text.41: þeof sceal gangan þystrum wederum.      þyrs sceal on fenne gewunian
text.42: ana innan lande.      Ides sceal dyrne cræfte,
text.43: fæmne hire freond gesecean,      gif heo nelle on folce geþeon
text.44: þæt hi man beagum gebicge.      Brim sceal sealte weallan,
text.45: lyfthelm and laguflod      ymb ealra landa gehwylc,
text.46: flowan firgenstreamas.      Feoh sceal on eorðan
text.47: tydran and tyman.      Tungol sceal on heofenum
text.48: beorhte scinan,      swa him bebead meotud.
text.49: God sceal wið yfele,      geogoð sceal wið yldo,
text.50: lif sceal wið deaþe,      leoht sceal wið þystrum,
text.51: fyrd wið fyrde,      feond wið oðrum,
text.52: lað wið laþe      ymb land sacan,
text.53: synne stælan.      A sceal snotor hycgean
text.54: ymb þysse worulde gewinn,      wearh hangian,
text.55: fægere ongildan      þæt he ær facen dyde
text.57: hwyder seo sawul sceal      syððan hweorfan,
text.58: and ealle þa gastas      þe for gode hweorfað
text.60: on fæder fæðme.      Is seo forðgesceaft
text.61: digol and dyrne;      drihten ana wat,
text.63: hider under hrofas,      þe þæt her for soð
text.64: mannum secge      hwylc sy meotodes gesceaft,
text.65: sigefolca gesetu,      þær he sylfa wunað.
text.8: geres wæstmas,      þa þe him god sendeð.

source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry
